definition: directly, the act of smacking something, press (the lips) together and open (the lips) noisily, as in eating
details:
adverb
- directly
= synonyms: man-to-man
noun
- the act of smacking something
= synonyms: smacking
- an enthusiastic kiss
= synonyms: smooch
- street names for heroin
= synonyms: big H, hell dust, nose drops, thunder, skag, scag
- a sailing ship (usually rigged like a sloop or cutter) used in fishing and sailing along the coast
- the taste experience when a savoury condiment is taken into the mouth
= synonyms: nip
- a blow from a flat object (as an open hand)
= synonyms: slap
verb
- press (the lips) together and open (the lips) noisily, as in eating
- deliver a hard blow to
= example: deliver a hard blow to
= synonyms: thwack
- kiss lightly
= synonyms: peck
- have a distinctive or characteristic taste
= synonyms: taste
- have an element suggestive of something
= example: have an element suggestive of something
= synonyms: smell
